Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relate to service retirement of members of the New York city fire department pension fund
Summary: Removes the twenty-five year requirement for tier three escalation for service retirement of members of the New York city fire department pension fund.
LawCode: Amd ยง510, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to service retirement of members of the New York city fire department pension fund
